 */export var UPDATE_CUSTOMER_SIGN_IN_STATUS='UPDATE_CUSTOMER_SIGN_IN_STATUS';export var UPDATE_CUSTOMER_DETAILS='UPDATE_CUSTOMER_DETAILS';export var UPDATE_CUSTOMER_PASSWORD_RESET_STATUS='UPDATE_CUSTOMER_PASSWORD_RESET_STATUS';export var UPDATE_CUSTOMER_PASSWORD_FORGOT_STATUS='UPDATE_CUSTOMER_PASSWORD_FORGOT_STATUS';export var UPDATE_CUSTOMER_IS_LOADING='UPDATE_CUSTOMER_IS_LOADING';/** @namespace Store/MyAccount/Action/updateCustomerSignInStatus */export var updateCustomerSignInStatus=middleware(function(status){return{type:UPDATE_CUSTOMER_SIGN_IN_STATUS,status:status};},"Store/MyAccount/Action/updateCustomerSignInStatus");/** @namespace Store/MyAccount/Action/updateCustomerDetails */export var updateCustomerDetails=middleware(function(customer){return{type:UPDATE_CUSTOMER_DETAILS,customer:customer};},"Store/MyAccount/Action/updateCustomerDetails");/** @namespace Store/MyAccount/Action/updateCustomerPasswordResetStatus */export var updateCustomerPasswordResetStatus=middleware(function(status,message){return{type:UPDATE_CUSTOMER_PASSWORD_RESET_STATUS,status:status,message:message};},"Store/MyAccount/Action/updateCustomerPasswordResetStatus");/** @namespace Store/MyAccount/Action/updateCustomerPasswordForgotStatus */export var updateCustomerPasswordForgotStatus=middleware(function(){return{type:UPDATE_CUSTOMER_PASSWORD_FORGOT_STATUS};},"Store/MyAccount/Action/updateCustomerPasswordForgotStatus");/** @namespace Store/MyAccount/Action/updateCustomerIsLoading */export var updateIsLoading=middleware(function(isLoading){return{type:UPDATE_CUSTOMER_IS_LOADING,isLoading:isLoading};},"Store/MyAccount/Action/updateCustomerIsLoading");
